name: app
description: - react react-router4 redux react-redux ### webpack ```angular2html npm install webpack webpack-dev-server ``` ### babel ```angular2html npm install babel-core babel-loader babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-stage-0 babel-preset-react css-loader style-loader less less-loader html-webpack-plugin -D ``` ### react ```angular2html npm install react redux react-redux react-router-dom -S ``` ### fetch ```angular2html npm install es6-promise whatwg-fetch -D ``` ### express ```angular2html npm install express -S ```
